privacy_policy.section1_intro: We may collect the following types of data:
privacy_policy.section1_personal: Personal Information: This includes but is not limited to your name, email address, and other contact details provided during account registration or usage of our services.
privacy_policy.section1_usage: Usage Information: We may collect information about how you interact with our services, including but not limited to IP addresses, device information, and browsing history.
privacy_policy.section1_cookies: Cookies and Similar Technologies: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience and gather information about your preferences.
privacy_policy.section2_intro: We may use your personal data for the following purposes:
privacy_policy.section2_delivery: Service Delivery: To provide and maintain our services, including personalized content and features.
privacy_policy.section2_comms: Communication: To communicate with you, respond to your inquiries, and provide important information about our services.
privacy_policy.section2_analytics: Analytics: To analyze usage patterns, improve our services, and customize content based on user preferences.
privacy_policy.section3_intro: We may disclose your personal data in the following situations:
privacy_policy.section3_legal: Legal Obligations: To comply with legal obligations, such as responding to lawful requests or court orders.
privacy_policy.section3_third_parties: Third-Party Service Providers: We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in delivering our services, subject to confidentiality agreements.
privacy_policy.section3_business: Business Transactions: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of our assets, your personal data may be transferred as part of the transaction.

reminder_page.title: Reminder about Poligamy Sunnah
reminder_page.ayat_quote: "…then marry those that please you of women, two, three, or four. But if you fear that you will not be just, then [marry only] one…" (An-Nisa 4:3)
reminder_page.ayat_note: Justice between wives is an explicit condition for permissibility.
reminder_page.hadith_1: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: "The best of you are those who are best to their families, and I am the best of you to my family." (Tirmidhi)
reminder_page.hadith_2: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: "Fear Allah and be just among your children (and family)." (Bukhari & Muslim)
reminder_page.hadith_note: Kindness, justice, and maintaining rights are binding duties.
reminder_page.scholars_1: Polygyny is permissible with the strict condition of justice in maintenance, time, housing, and fair treatment. If justice is feared to be unmet, one marriage is safer.
reminder_page.scholars_2: Justice does not include equality in the heart, but it requires fairness in outward rights and responsibilities.
reminder_page.scholars_3: Entering polygyny is a serious covenant. Failing to uphold justice is a major sin and a cause of worldly and spiritual harm.
reminder_page.adab_1: - Uphold justice equally in spending, housing, and time.
reminder_page.adab_2: - Maintain privacy and dignity of each wife; avoid harm and comparison.
reminder_page.adab_3: - Be truthful, responsible, and transparent from the beginning.
reminder_page.adab_4: - Involve families appropriately and honor guardianship protocols.
reminder_page.adab_5: - Keep intentions pure for a halal marriage and seek Allah’s pleasure.

how_do_i_create_my_profile.question: How do I create my profile?
how_do_i_create_my_profile.answer: Sign up with your email, complete the registration process including your Islamic preferences, upload photos, and verify your account. The setup includes personal details, religious practices, and marriage intentions.

what_makes_this_app_different_from_other.question: What makes this app different from other dating apps?
what_makes_this_app_different_from_other.answer: Zawajplus is specifically designed for halal partner search with complete privacy protection. Users can stay private while looking for a halal partner, with photos and videos kept secure until requested. We focus on serious marriage intentions with family involvement.

can_i_stay_private_while_using_the_app.question: Can I stay private while using the app?
can_i_stay_private_while_using_the_app.answer: Yes, absolutely! You can maintain complete privacy while searching for a halal partner. Your personal information and media are protected, and you control what information is shared and when.

how_does_polygamy_support_work_for_men.question: How does polygamy support work for men?
how_does_polygamy_support_work_for_men.answer: Men can specify the number of wives they are looking for: 2nd wife, 3rd wife, or 4th wife. This helps women understand the marriage position being offered and make informed decisions according to Islamic principles.

what_options_do_women_have_regarding_pol.question: What options do women have regarding polygamy?
what_options_do_women_have_regarding_pol.answer: Women can choose to accept polygamy and specify which marriage positions they would consider (1st, 2nd, 3rd, or 4th wife). This ensures clear understanding of the marriage arrangement from the beginning.

what_islamic_preferences_can_i_set.question: What Islamic preferences can I set?
what_islamic_preferences_can_i_set.answer: You can specify your prayer frequency, Quran reading habits, hijab preferences, halal diet adherence, and religious practice level. These help in finding compatible partners who share similar Islamic values and practices.

how_are_photos_and_videos_handled.question: How are photos and videos handled?
how_are_photos_and_videos_handled.answer: All photos and videos are kept private and secure. They will only be opened and shared based on your specific request. This ensures Islamic modesty principles are maintained while allowing meaningful connections.

how_do_video_meetings_work.question: How do video meetings work?
how_do_video_meetings_work.answer: Users can arrange video calls on an agreed time window. Once both parties agree on a suitable time, a secure video meeting can be scheduled. This allows face-to-face interaction in a controlled, respectful environment.

can_i_schedule_video_meetings_in_advance.question: Can I schedule video meetings in advance?
can_i_schedule_video_meetings_in_advance.answer: Yes! You can propose a time window that works for you, and the other person can agree to the timing. This ensures both parties are prepared and available for meaningful conversation.

who_can_participate_in_video_meetings.question: Who can participate in video meetings?
who_can_participate_in_video_meetings.answer: Video meetings can include family members or guardians as appropriate according to Islamic guidelines. This ensures proper supervision and family involvement in the marriage process.

how_do_i_find_potential_partners.question: How do I find potential partners?
how_do_i_find_potential_partners.answer: You can filter profiles based on your preferences, select profiles that interest you, send requests to connect, and arrange meetings. Our system helps you find compatible partners while maintaining Islamic principles.

what_happens_after_i_send_a_connection_r.question: What happens after I send a connection request?
what_happens_after_i_send_a_connection_r.answer: The other person will receive your request and can choose to accept or decline. If accepted, you can begin communicating and potentially arrange a video meeting to get to know each other better.

how_are_profiles_verified.question: How are profiles verified?
how_are_profiles_verified.answer: Our dedicated agents carefully verify all profiles to ensure authenticity. We check identity documents, verify photos, and confirm the information provided to maintain a trustworthy community.

are_families_informed_about_meetings.question: Are families informed about meetings?
are_families_informed_about_meetings.answer: Yes, our agents ensure that families of brides are properly informed before any meetings take place. This maintains Islamic traditions of family involvement and ensures appropriate supervision.

how_do_you_ensure_user_safety.question: How do you ensure user safety?
how_do_you_ensure_user_safety.answer: We implement profile verification by our agents, secure data storage, family notification systems, and provide Islamic interaction guidelines. All activities are monitored to maintain a safe, halal environment.

can_i_control_who_sees_my_information.question: Can I control who sees my information?
can_i_control_who_sees_my_information.answer: Yes, you have complete control over your privacy. Your photos, videos, and personal details remain private until you specifically choose to share them with someone you're interested in connecting with.

can_i_edit_my_preferences_after_registra.question: Can I edit my preferences after registration?
can_i_edit_my_preferences_after_registra.answer: Yes, you can update your Islamic preferences, marriage intentions, and other profile details anytime through your profile settings. This allows you to refine your search as your preferences evolve.

what_if_i_want_to_change_my_polygamy_pre.question: What if I want to change my polygamy preferences?
what_if_i_want_to_change_my_polygamy_pre.answer: You can modify your marriage intention preferences at any time. For men, you can change which wife number you're seeking (2nd, 3rd, 4th). For women, you can adjust which positions you would consider.

how_do_i_delete_my_account.question: How do I delete my account?
how_do_i_delete_my_account.answer: Contact our support team through the Contact Us section. We will help you delete your account and all associated data while ensuring all privacy regulations are followed and any ongoing connections are handled appropriately.
